nodes.text: An automatic re-cocker was a device that was used by members of the Wookiee species to make it faster and easier to fire a bowcaster. The devices were not available for sale, but the price of the re-cocker's components was 500 credits.
The automatic re-cocker was mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
